summary: Created ExpressionInput component for expression autocomplete

features: Detects $node[" trigger to show autocomplete dropdown
Filters node names based on typed prefix
Shows path suggestions from node last_output JSON
Keyboard navigation (ArrowUp, ArrowDown, Enter, Tab, Escape)

helper_types.NodeInfo: Carries node name and last_output for suggestions
